text.section:
A person who violates any provision of this title or of any regulation adopted under this title is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject:
To a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 3 months, or both; or
To a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year, or both, for any subsequent violation of this title that occurs within 2 years of an earlier violation of this title.
Each day that a person practices well drilling without a license constitutes a separate offense.
